Bash(SKIP_TESTS=1 git commit -m "fix: use correct command dns:apps:sync in post-create hook

The post-create hook was calling ''dokku dns:sync'' which doesn''t exist.
The correct command is ''dokku dns:apps:sync''.

This was the root cause of test 165 failing - the sync command never
ran because the command name was wrong.

Also removed debug output from get_server_ip() since we found the issue.
